DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the study is to assess the efficacy of calcium dobesilate for treating chronic venous wounds. The hypothesis is that venous ulcers treated with standards measures (compressive measures) and calcium dobesilate will heal-up better than venous ulcers treated with standards measures (compressive measures) and placebo.
DOC.brief_title: Calcium Dobesilate for Chronic Venous Wounds
